data.project_description: Krisumi Corporation is poised to unveil the extraordinary Krisumi Waterfall Residences, a luxurious residential haven in Gurgaon that promises to leave a lasting impression. This groundbreaking collaboration between Sumitomo Corp, a renowned Japanese entity, and Krishna Group, a distinguished Indian organization, combines their collective expertise and cutting-edge technology to create a truly unique living experience. As the first project of its kind in India to involve a Japanese company, Krisumi Waterfall Residences pioneers the art of Japanese living, seamlessly integrating it into Indian homes. This innovative residency promises to set a new standard for luxury and sophistication in the Indian real estate market.
projectRedefine_Connectivity: Located in Sector 36A on Dwarka Expressway Gurgaon
projectRedefine_Entertainment: 1 KM from Cyber Hub 2
projectRedefine_Business: D 1 minutes From Upcoming ISBT
projectRedefine_Education: Direct Connectivity with Dwarka Expressway
data.meta_description: Krisumi Waterfall Residences Offers 2/3 LDK with World Class Amenities in Sector 36A Gurgaon. Krisumi Corporation is the First Indo-Japanese Real Estate Project
data.meta_title: Krisumi Waterfall Residences - Sector 36A Dwarka Expressway Gurgaon
data.projectBgContent: KRISUMI WATERFALL RESIDENCES SECTOR 36A GURGAON
data.AboutDeveloper: An enterprising collaboration between Sumitomo Corporation, Japan and Krishna Group, India, Krisumi is a convergence of Kriya, meaning creation in Sanskrit, and Sumi, the Japanese word for fine living. Our endeavour is to conceptualize, design and build homes which are characterized by the highest standards of Japanese craftsmanship, in sizes that complement today’s ever-evolving way of life. By unifying Japanese design aesthetics with the warmth of Indian hospitality, we at Krisumi are giving shape to architectural masterpieces that are spectacular in form, and highly practical in function.

highlight.highlight_Point: Krisumi Corporation launching soon new project Krisumi City Gurgaon Waterfall Residences with world class amenities.
1st phase to have over 450 apartments (1.2 million sq ft) and will be completed in 4-5 years.
Construction of the 1st phase of the project expected to commence this year.
Township spread over 65 acres will be developed in 7-8 phases with around 5,000 apartments (18 million sq ft approx) over 10 years.
The project will also feature a high-end retail mall, education institutions, a premium hotel and premium office spaces.
The master plan and architectural design of Krisumi City Gurgaon is developed by world renowned Japanese design firm NIKKEN SEKKEI.

Signature Global stands for 'Superbness in the Trinity Of Men, Materials, and Money,' embodying the company's core values of quality, timely delivery, and superior craftsmanship. Signature Global is renowned for its groundbreaking and unparalleled concepts, offering multi-dimensional real estate solutions and exceptional service standards. The company is committed to creating state-of-the-art real estate masterpieces and consistently attracts the best talent in the industry. With rich experience in the real estate domain, Signature Global leverages a network of elite intermediaries, financial institutions, high-net-worth individuals, and some of the most reputable designers in India.

data.project_description: M3M Altitude, situated in Sector 65, Gurgaon, is a paragon of luxury living, offering a sublime residential experience. These sumptuous apartments are crafted to meet the refined tastes of the modern homeowner, harmoniously balancing elegance, comfort, and convenience. The development boasts an array of world-class amenities, including a cutting-edge fitness center, an opulent swimming pool, a stylish clubhouse, and exquisitely landscaped gardens. Strategically located, M3M Altitude ensures seamless connectivity to major thoroughfares, upscale shopping centers, gourmet dining options, and entertainment venues. With its robust security measures and eco-friendly practices, this development redefines the pinnacle of luxury living, making it the ultimate haven for discerning individuals.

data.project_description: Ganga Realty Fusion 85, situated in Sector 85, Gurgaon, is a masterpiece of contemporary architecture and innovative design. This iconic development features sleek high-rise towers nestled amidst lush greenery and beautifully landscaped gardens, creating a tranquil oasis for its residents. The apartments are thoughtfully designed to maximize natural light and ventilation, offering breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape. The strategic location of Ganga Apartments in Sector 85, Gurgaon, is a significant factor in its popularity. The sector's seamless connectivity to major roads and highways, including National Highway 48 and the Dwarka Expressway, ensures effortless access to Delhi and other key areas of Gurgaon, making it a coveted destination for discerning homeowners.

data.project_description: AIPL Joy Gallery, an exquisite mixed-use retail development in Sector 66, Gurugram, along the main Golf Course Extension Road. Spanning over 4.418 acres with a total super area of 3,38,699sq. ft., this project promises a luxurious retail and F&B experience like no other. Boasting strategic features and seamless connectivity, AIPL Joy Gallery is a haven of top-notch retail shops on Golf Course Extension Road. AIPL Joy Gallery presents a delightful blend of experiences, featuring premium high-street retail, diverse restaurants, charming cafes, and an engaging entertainment zone. Backed by AIPL’s renowned expertise and more than three decades of experience in the real estate sector, this high-end retail development showcases a culture of trust and transparency, ensuring the finest features in Gurugram’s commercial projects.

data.AboutDeveloper: This journey of spreading joy in your life by helping you find your perfect home does not just end by handing over the keys to you. Stepping into your new home is just the beginning of our beautiful pervasive bonding. Every day and in every way, we strive to create an environment of trust and hope to keep you smiling always.We see ourselves not as a real estate company, but as a service provider. We see ourselves not as builder of homes, but as a builder of happy communities. We believe that we are not in the real estate business but in the 'happiness' business. We measure success not by the numbers in our balance sheet, but by the width of your smile. No wonder, we are rated as India’s Top 10 Realty brand and #1 Senior Living Homes brand. A fact that is endorsed by the 15,000+ families, for whom home means Ashiana.

data.AboutDeveloper: TARC Group is a well-established real estate developer that was founded in 1969. The company has a significant presence in the real estate sector across various states in India. TARC Group has successfully developed a wide range of medium to large-scale properties. Their residential projects are a testament to the developer's unwavering commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. TARC Group's impressive portfolio and dedicated team make them a trustworthy name in the real estate industry.

data.project_description:
In sector 103, near Gurgaon’s Dwarka Expressway, you’ll find Whiteland Urban Resort. This is a fancy living proje­ct designed by Whiteland Corporation 103 Gurgaon. There are 3 BHK and 4 BHK super luxury apartme­nts on the plan.

There’s a lot to like­, with first-rate amenities and fair prices. We aim to give you more than a house at Whiteland Urban Resort Sector 103 Gurgaon. it should feel like a dream vacation home. They use top quality materials and spe­ed up the building process to make­ sure everything’s just right. You won’t have­ to fuss over parking – there’s a spot re­served for each home. The property has special towe­rs, offering open views on thre­e sides from most apartments, luxury fe­atures, and deck balconies. The­ height of the ceilings re­mind you of villas. And one of the best parts of prope­rty 103? It’s close to both Delhi and Gurgaon. It’s the ide­al place to live, really.

data.project_description: Welcome to Godrej Zenith, an epitome of ultra-luxury living in Sector 89, Gurgaon. Prepare to experience the highlight of the year with Godrej Properties' newest residential offering. Situated in the rapidly developing area of New Gurgaon, this project spans approximately 14.25 acres of prime land with 9 towers comprising a total of 1314 units. Designed with low density in mind, each floor hosts only 4 apartments, ensuring spaciousness and privacy. The interiors are meticulously crafted to elevate your lifestyle, blending modernity with sophistication for a truly luxurious living experience.

data.AboutDeveloper: Smartworld is a real estate company envisioned as the future of real estate in India. It is an organization built on the ethos of bringing in a refreshing change in the real estate industry with honesty, professionalism and transparency being in the DNA of the company. At Smartworld, every aspect from Scale, Humanizing Technology, Business Digitization to Designs, and Evolved Lifescapes has been given the utmost importance to create a perfect, winning combination. The company is an amalgamation of top-notch professionals and proven achievers and has a prolific board that advises the organization on the best-in-class international standards including corporate governance, industry practices and design philosophy. data.AboutDeveloper: Welcome to AIPL, where luxury meets legacy and innovation intertwines with timeless heritage. With over three decades of visionary leadership, we've not only sculpted the commercial skyline but have also crafted premium residential spaces, bustling retail hubs, and iconic townships across eight prominent cities. From bespoke group housing and state-of-the-art offices to elite malls, high street retail, avant-garde clubs, and cafes, our diverse portfolio resonates with both grandeur and individuality. With every venture rooted in profound market analysis, our spaces don't just adhere to architectural standards but also exude a unique character of their own. Entrusted by over 80+ multinational and esteemed corporates, let AIPL take you on an immersive journey where timeless heritage gracefully harmonizes with modern opulence.

data.project_description: Experience the pinnacle of integrated retail and commercial development at AIPL Joy Square in Gurugram, India. Designed by DP Architects, this groundbreaking project captures the spirit of a lively high street marketplace, offering an eclectic mix of shopping outlets, supermarkets, diverse dining options, and serviced apartments. Ideally situated on Golf Course Extension Road in Sector 63A, AIPL Joy Square provides excellent connectivity to the rest of the city, positioning itself as a premier choice among emerging commercial projects in Gurugram. Spanning 2.84 acres and featuring 10 floors (G+9) with extensive basement and surface parking, AIPL Joy Square guarantees a vibrant and dynamic experience. This project redefines high-street retail in Gurugram, setting new standards with AIPL’s expertise.

data.AboutDeveloper: Godrej Properties is currently developing residential, commercial and township projects spread across approximately 14 million square meters (147 million square feet) in 12 cities. Established in 1990, Godrej Properties Limited is the first real estate company to have ISO certification. Each Godrej Properties development combines a 120-year legacy of excellence and trust with a commitment to cutting-edge design and technology.

data.AboutDeveloper: Since its inception in 1986, Ambience Group distinguished itself from the competition as the developers of premium real estate projects. Ambience commenced its journey of developing premium Residential Apartments in South Delhi, and later acquired a landmark real estate land parcel in Gurgaon, NH-8, zero km from Delhi Border for the development of signature integrated township ‘Ambience Island’. The property comprises of Residential (Ambience Caitriona & Ambience Lagoon), Retail (Ambience Mall), Hotel (Leela Ambience), Commercial (Ambience Corporate Tower), 9 Hole Golf Greens and Community Facilities.

data.AboutDeveloper: The Brand ‘M3M’ stands for magnificence in the trinity of Men, Materials and Money. Simply put, the Brand ‘M3M’ has a philosophy that strives for excellence, culminating in absolute magnificence in every aspect of its character, ethics and way of doing business. What the brand stands for is in sync with its slogan of “Our Expertise. Your Joy.” The Brand ‘M3M’ firmly believes in achieving brilliance through true professionalism and cutting-edge technology.

data.project_description: Smart World Sector 69 Gurugram is a premium residential development that offers a luxurious lifestyle with its meticulously designed 2 BHK, 3 BHK, and 4 BHK apartments. This exclusive project is strategically located in one of the most sought-after areas of Gurugram, providing residents with unparalleled connectivity and convenience. The development is a perfect blend of modern architecture and thoughtful planning, ensuring that every aspect of contemporary living is addressed. Each apartment is designed to maximize space and light, creating an ambiance of elegance and comfort. The interiors are adorned with high-quality finishes and fittings, reflecting a sophisticated aesthetic that caters to the tastes of discerning homeowners.

data.AboutDeveloper: Smartworld is a real estate company envisioned as the future of real estate in India. It is an organization built on the ethos of bringing in a refreshing change in the real estate industry with honesty, professionalism and transparency being in the DNA of the company. At Smartworld, every aspect from Scale, Humanizing Technology, Business Digitization to Designs, and Evolved Lifescapes has been given the utmost importance to create a perfect, winning combination. The company is an amalgamation of top-notch professionals and proven achievers and has a prolific board that advises the organization on the best-in-class international standards including corporate governance, industry practices and design philosophy. Smartworld combines the vast experience of professionals whose experience of Sales, Marketing, Product Design and Project Management Delivery exceeds over Rs. 50 billion in sales and 1 billion sq. ft. in project execution.

data.project_description: Silverglades' New Project in Sector 63, Gurgaon offers a sophisticated living experience in the bustling heart of Gurugram. With spacious 3 and 4 BHK apartments, this project is designed to provide a blend of comfort and luxury. The homes feature ample natural light, high-end finishes, and large balconies that offer stunning city views. This development creates an inviting atmosphere, where modern elegance and thoughtful details come together to elevate your everyday living.

data.AboutDeveloper: Silverglades, founded three decades ago in 1988, are the true heralds of luxury real estate with a glorious legacy of creating some of India's very first lifestyle innovations. Fueled by Mr. Pradeep Jain's vision, we are passionate about bringing some of the finest experiences on Indian turf. We are committed to delivering excellence with a process that has grown over the years across a spectrum of segments- luxury residential, unique theme-based resorts, retail, mixed use and much more, and have forged lasting ties with the world's most renowned partners to create an extraordinary league of addresses and iconic urban masterpieces.

data.project_description: Introducing Tulip Crimson – the latest luxury offering from Tulip Group's Platinum Collection. This exclusive addition combines innovative architectural design with the tranquility of nature, redefining luxury living. Tulip Crimson is more than just a residence; it is a private retreat where every amenity is thoughtfully designed for an unparalleled living experience.Located adjacent to the main SPR road, Tulip Crimson provides effortless connectivity to Gurugram’s key destinations while offering a peaceful, serene environment. Discover the elegance of choice and the charm of exclusive living. Welcome to Tulip Crimson, where your next chapter begins in style.

data.AboutDeveloper:
Established as a cornerstone of trust and innovation in the Indian real estate sector,
Tulip Infratech has become synonymous with excellence and quality in residential and
commercial developments. Founded in 2005, we have a commendable record of
delivering over 5500 homes across 18 projects, developing over 100 acres, reflecting
our commitment to transforming the National Capital Region's skyline.
Tulip Infratech prides itself on its punctuality, ensuring that each project is completed
within the promised timeline, a testament to our integrity and reliability. We are
known for creating homes that are more than structures; they are a blend of dreams,
aesthetics, and functionality, offering state-of-the-art amenities that ensure a
comfortable and luxurious lifestyle.

data.project_description: The seven towering structures of 4S The Aurum will gracefully ascend over Gurugram, offering stunning views of the lush Aravalli mountain range. Designed as a dynamic and welcoming enclave, 4S The Aurum fosters not just a place to live, but a true sense of community. With a seamless blend of modern luxury and natural beauty, residents can enjoy peace and tranquility in the scenic surroundings while having access to top-notch amenities. This creates a perfect balance between urban convenience and serene, nature-inspired living.
